## GitDocumentDB.put property

put() add a set of key and its value to the database.<br> <br> NOTE: put() does not check a write permission of your file system (unlike open()).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
put: (document: {
        [key: string]: string;
    }) => Promise<PutResult>;
```
